analysis.description:
Reentrancy in GoldmintPool.migrateToNewControllerContract (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#360-380):
	External calls:
	- core.setNewControllerAddress(newControllerAddr) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#366-367)
	- stakeFreezer.setNewControllerAddress(newControllerAddr) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#369-372)
	- mntpTokenAmount = getMntpBalance() (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#372-373)
	- goldTokenAmount = getGoldBalance() (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#373-374)
	- mntpToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,mntpTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#374-375)
	- goldToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,goldTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#378-379)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isActualContractVer (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#379)
frozenAmount in GoldmintPool.unholdStake (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#276-277) is a local variable never initialiazed

GoldmintPool.holdStake (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#263-275) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),mntpAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#269-271)

GoldmintPool.unholdStake (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#276-288) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#287)

GoldmintPool.distribShareProfit (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#288-300) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transferFrom(tokenBankAddress,address(this),mntpReward) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#292-295)
	-goldToken.transferFrom(tokenBankAddress,address(this),goldReward) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#296-297)

GoldmintPool.withdrawUserReward (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#300-321) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(msg.sender,mntpReward) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#315-318)
	-goldToken.transfer(msg.sender,goldReward) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#318-319)

GoldmintPool.migrateToNewControllerContract (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#360-380) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mntpToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,mntpTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#374-375)
	-goldToken.transfer(newControllerAddr,goldTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#378-379)

Reentrancy in GoldmintPool.constructor (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#239-250):
	External calls:
	- mntpToken = core.mntpToken() (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#246-249)
	- goldToken = core.goldToken() (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#249)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- goldToken (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#249)
	- tokenBankAddress (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#249-250)

PoolCore._mntpRewardPerShare (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#72-73) is never used in PoolCore
PoolCore._goldRewardPerShare (/unique_chucks/10/0x9568c8c783f7166a9b88d0047ad28efc43921242.sol#75-77) is never used in PoolCore
